snippet: Brendan Hansen’s wife, Martha, is expecting the couple’s first child later this year, so Hansen knows that no matter how he fares in London, he can count on 2012 being a watershed year.
abstract: Brendan Hansen’s wife, Martha, is expecting the couple’s first child later this year, so Hansen knows that no matter how he fares in London, he can count on 2012 being a watershed year.

headline.main: For Brendan Hansen, First the Olympics, Then Fatherhood
headline.print_headline: After Olympics End, Life As a Father Will Begin
